item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions; they cease to be mind." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Remorse.-- Never yield to remorse, but at once tell yourself: remorse would simply mean adding to the first act of stupidity a second." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In individuals, insanity is rare; but in groups, parties, nations and epochs, it is the rule." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In heaven, all the interesting people are missing." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "What is the seal of liberation? Not to be ashamed in front of oneself." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Faith: not wanting to know what the truth is." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The advantage of a bad memory is that one enjoys several times the same good things for the first time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "As soon as a religion comes to dominate it has as its opponents all those who would have been its first disciples. " -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "My dear friend, what is this our life? A boat that swims in the sea, and all one knows for certain about it is that one day it will capsize. Here we are, two good old boats that have been faithful neighbors, and above all your hand has done its best to keep me from "capsizing"! Let us then continue our voyage—each for the other's sake, for a long time yet, a long time! We should miss each other so much! Tolerably calm seas and good winds and above all sun—what I wish for myself, I wish for you, too, and am sorry that my gratitude can find expression only in such a wish and has no influence at all on wind or weather!" -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Sometimes people don't want to hear the truth because they don't want their illusions destroyed." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adhikar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche
